/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/display.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/displayfacet.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/helpers.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/loadmodels.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/loadoperations.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/loadoptypes.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/models.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/operations.cpp.o CMakeFiles/viewer3d.dir/src/viewer3d.cpp.o  -o viewer3d -lglut -lGL -lGLU
